Articles.Content: Question is, what is the 23's its total fuel

Reminds me of a H-Drek mk7(ish), and in the same mass area too. with the same amount of engines!

http://i.imgur.com/xCKTUBs.jpg

Like that one. I liked those ones, they had some kind of fuel.

EDIT:Mk5 resembles it closest.

Mk IV is closest, In my opinion And as for fuel, it has only 4- double tanks... not much, but reasonable It also has 2 Ion engines and a full RCS compliment.

As for the armor.... UNBELIEVABLE! This stuff is good! I mean, I hit it, straight from the top, from 400m (the ultimate kill range for my Shredders) and it did....

NOTHING!

HOW IS THIS? HOW! AAAH IT's AMAZING! IT IS ONLY 64.8 TONNES!

////!BATTLE ALERT!////

Mechani Union vs. Udon Space Contractor

Location: Eve and Gilly (If anyone wants to land smaller ships on Gilly)

Rules:

Standard w/

1. No leaving SOI

2. Max weight: 250 tons (total weight of all ships)

3. 5 ships

4. No K-Drive (for safety reasons)

5. Breaks are allowed if needed.

Mechani Union Fleet:

The MU Battlecruiser Dr. Strangekerb is in orbit with a squadron of escort vessels.

Its escorts are:

x2 Recon Corvette Mk.2, Escort Leader and Escort 2.

x1 "Nymph" Heavy Fighter: Escort 3.

x1 D-13 Fighter: Escort 4.

Persist:

http://www./download/br1vqvjltr326tw/persistent(3).sfs
Im gonna say again, if anyone wants to battle me, I'd love to test out the 23

Also, I tested my Corvette MK2's ZS-made Shredders on one of my Avatar-class Supercarriers.

Needless to say, it did a LOT of damage, but I couldn't tell how much since part of the shrapnel went straight through the sship, leaving a hole in the hangar bay, while the rest of the ship started spinning.

Epic Pic from Testing:

Zekes, I've said it once, and I'll say it again: your Shredders are awesome.

I don't understand why you don't use radial detachment points instead of those I-beams. I fire my missiles from only 150m and they still do decent damage thanks to them. it might be the mass but for a missile that heavy extra mass might be beneficial.

EDIT:I don't want to battle but I want to blow a twentythree up.

*crewboop*

Sure, I'd like to see how it looks now. I wonder what a modernized Vanguard would look like...
It looks the same although internally and structurally it's very different.(I modernised them all before myself) Proto-E-Gen-2

I made her completely from scratch. That way I can say that even though it was an inspired design, it is my own.

Upgrades include:

an increase in fuel

2 guidable SRB's

4 I beam missiles

and a claw to let me steal supplies from destroyed or damaged ships

She is still in the creation stage so she aint finished. But I do plain on adding it to my fleet roster

http://i.imgur.com/Tm9T88B.png

Upgrades include:

2 guidable SRB's

daw, it's so cute what is her tonnage? 50 tonnes is my guess....

daw, it's so cute what is her tonnage? 50 tonnes is my guess....

Bout 74 last I checked

Here total fuel capacity is over 3000 though

Edit:My plain for her is that she will be a jack of all trades

She has decent armor

She is so light but is able to carry a bunch a fuel because I dumped some out. But when I kill a target I will steal some fuel and load up as much as I can.

As for weapons, I can stet them after a kill and use the claw to remove any parts still attached to the missiles like a docking port blocking the other docking port I need to dock with. Then I can attach it to my ship

So she is a light destroyer, a fuel tanker, and a thief ship all in one
